Name: File System - Create Folder
Description: Creates a folder structure that is passed in.

Parameters.Name: FolderPath
Parameters.Label: The folder path to create on the filesystem.
Parameters.HelpText: The entire path to the folder, this step will also created nested folders.  For example "D:\one\two" will create two folders ('one', and then 'two' under folder 'one').  This script will not remove items from the folders.
